title: Check Out This Picture Of Mira Rajput Shopping For Her Wedding Jewellery
text:
facebook 274 SHARES 
Mira Rajput has managed to charm everyone, especially after her Koffee With Karan appearance with hubby Shahid Kapoor. However, she still remains quite a mystery in general, and that's why we love to catch these tiny glimpses of her. A recently shared photo on Instagram showed the beautiful bride-to-be (last year) shopping for jewellery for her wedding day. A post shared by Shamira Fanclub üë©‚Äç‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüíã‚Äçüë© (@shahidmirafb) on Feb 15, 2017 at 11:24am PST 
Needless to say, she looks lovely.
